WHY_ME.TEXT: Hi, I'm a web developer passionate about modern, high-performance solutions. I'm looking for new projects where I can contribute my experience and help turn your digital ideas into reality. Planning something new? Drop me a message, I'm excited to hear from you!

SKILLS.STATEMENT: Im always excited to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.

PROJECTS.CARD_1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks via drag-and-drop and assign them to users and categories.
PROJECTS.CARD_2: A jumping, running, and throwing game based on object-oriented principles. Help Pepe collect coins and Tabasco salsa to battle the crazy chicken.
PROJECTS.CARD_3: Together with my team, Im developing a business-focused chat client in this project. A platform similar to Discord, WhatsApp, or Slack, but tailored to professional needs.

TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE_1: Richard not only brings technical expertise but also listens well and contributes constructive ideas to the team. Sometimes he was a bit too detail-focused, but that often led to high-quality results.
TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE_2: Technically excellent, but what I really appreciated about working with him was his openness to feedback.
TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE_3: Richard is someone you can rely on. Even under pressure, he stays calm, solution-oriented, and supports the team effectively.
